text:
Hi Adeshewa, hope you're well! Sorry for not getting back to you. I've had some setbacks these last weeks but everything is fine. 
Please do send me a link not your channel when you do it, I'd love to see your work! The series will me soon wrapping up here, although it only starts airing in the UK in April. We've been working on some other projects as well to see if the production can continue here without interruption.
I'll soon be sending out my portfolio again because we're never sure if we will be able to stay at the same studio when a projects gets to the end.
